description: Lists the test recommendations for the Resilience Hub application.

parameters.name: assessmentArn
parameters.description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the assessment. The format for this ARN is: arn: partition:resiliencehub: region: account:app-assessment/ app-id. For more information about ARNs, see Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) in the Amazon Web Services General Reference guide.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: Token for the next set of results, or null if there are no more results.

nested_items.name: testRecommendations
nested_items.description: The test recommendations for the Resilience Hub application.

nested_items.name: appComponentId
nested_items.description: Indicates the identifier of the AppComponent.

nested_items.name: appComponentName
nested_items.description: Name of the Application Component.

nested_items.name: dependsOnAlarms
nested_items.description: A list of recommended alarms that are used in the test and must be exported before or with the test.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: Description for the test recommendation.

nested_items.name: intent
nested_items.description: Intent of the test recommendation.

nested_items.name: items
nested_items.description: The test recommendation items.

nested_items.name: alreadyImplemented
nested_items.description: Specifies if the recommendation has already been implemented.

nested_items.name: discoveredAlarm
nested_items.description: Indicates the previously implemented Amazon CloudWatch alarm discovered by Resilience Hub.

nested_items.name: alarmArn
nested_items.description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Amazon CloudWatch alarm.

nested_items.name: source
nested_items.description: Indicates the source of the Amazon CloudWatch alarm. That is, it indicates if the alarm was created using Resilience Hub recommendation ( AwsResilienceHub), or if you had created the alarm in Amazon CloudWatch ( Customer).

nested_items.name: excludeReason
nested_items.description: Indicates the reason for excluding an operational recommendation.

nested_items.name: excluded
nested_items.description: Indicates if an operational recommendation item is excluded.

nested_items.name: latestDiscoveredExperiment
nested_items.description: Indicates the experiment created in FIS that was discovered by Resilience Hub, which matches the recommendation.

nested_items.name: experimentArn
nested_items.description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the FIS experiment.

nested_items.name: experimentTemplateId
nested_items.description: Identifier of the FIS experiment template.

nested_items.name: resourceId
nested_items.description: Identifier of the resource.

nested_items.name: targetAccountId
nested_items.description: Identifier of the target account.

nested_items.name: targetRegion
nested_items.description: The target region.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: Name of the test recommendation.

nested_items.name: prerequisite
nested_items.description: Prerequisite of the test recommendation.

nested_items.name: recommendationId
nested_items.description: Identifier for the test recommendation.

nested_items.name: recommendationStatus
nested_items.description: Status of the recommended test.

nested_items.name: referenceId
nested_items.description: Reference identifier for the test recommendation.

nested_items.name: risk
nested_items.description: Level of risk for this test recommendation.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: Type of test recommendation.
